Product Manager

TechStart Inc.
New York, NY (Hybrid)

About TechStart

TechStart is a fast-growing SaaS company revolutionizing how teams collaborate. We're backed by top-tier VCs and are scaling rapidly.

The Role

We're looking for a Product Manager to lead our core product initiatives. You'll work closely with engineering, design, and business teams to define and execute our product roadmap.

What You'll Do

  • Define product vision and strategy for key product areas
  • Gather and prioritize product requirements
  • Work with engineering to deliver high-quality features
  • Analyze metrics and user feedback to inform decisions
  • Present to leadership and stakeholders

What We're Looking For

  • 3-5 years of product management experience
  • Experience with B2B SaaS products
  • Strong analytical skills (SQL, Excel, analytics tools)
  • Excellent written and verbal communication
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies
  • Technical background is a plus
